benefits.title: Why Choose Facial Aesthetics at Dr. SNA Clinic?

longDescription: Your face tells your story, and we're here to ensure it's one of confidence and radiance. Our comprehensive range of facial aesthetic treatments combines medical expertise with artistic vision to deliver natural-looking results that enhance your unique features. From subtle refinements to dramatic transformations, we offer bespoke solutions tailored to your individual goals.

introduction.content: At Dr. SNA Clinic, facial aesthetics is our passion and specialty. We understand that every face is unique, with its own proportions, features, and character. Our approach combines medical precision with artistic sensibility to create results that are beautifully natural, elegantly subtle, and distinctly you.
introduction.title: The Art of Facial Aesthetics

hero.subheadline: Bespoke Facial Treatments for Timeless Elegance
hero.headline: Enhance Your Natural Beauty

faq.answer: The best treatment depends on your specific concerns and goals. Common starting points include anti-wrinkle injections for lines, dermal fillers for volume loss, and skin boosters for overall skin quality. During your consultation, we'll assess your face and recommend the most appropriate treatment or combination.
faq.question: Which facial treatment is right for me?
Will facial treatments make me look 'done' or frozen?
faq.answer: Absolutely not. Our philosophy focuses on natural-looking enhancement. We use advanced injection techniques and appropriate product amounts to ensure you maintain natural facial expressions while looking refreshed and rejuvenated.

faq.question: How long do facial aesthetic treatments last?
faq.answer: Duration varies by treatment: anti-wrinkle injections last 3-6 months, dermal fillers 6-18 months depending on the area and product, and regenerative treatments like PRP can show benefits for 12-18 months. We'll provide specific timelines for your chosen treatments.

faq.question: Are there any side effects?
faq.answer: Common temporary side effects include mild redness, swelling, or bruising at injection sites, typically resolving within hours to a few days. Serious complications are rare when treatments are performed by qualified practitioners. We'll discuss all potential risks during your consultation.

Yes! Many clients achieve optimal results through combination treatments. For example, pairing anti-wrinkle injections with dermal fillers addresses both dynamic and static aging. We'll create a comprehensive treatment plan that works synergistically.
faq.question: Can I combine multiple facial treatments?

faq.answer: There's no single 'right' age. Some people start preventatively in their late 20s with anti-wrinkle injections, while others begin in their 40s or beyond. The best time is when you notice concerns that bother you. We'll assess your individual needs regardless of age.
faq.question: When is the best age to start facial aesthetic treatments?
How much do facial aesthetic treatments cost?
faq.answer: Prices vary by treatment complexity and product amount required. Anti-wrinkle injections start from £195, dermal fillers from £295, and advanced treatments like PRP from £450. We'll provide a detailed quote during your consultation.

faq.question: Is there any downtime with facial treatments?
faq.answer: Most treatments require minimal to no downtime. Anti-wrinkle injections have virtually none, while filler treatments may cause slight swelling for 1-3 days. PRP and polynucleotide treatments may have mild redness for 24-48 hours. You can typically resume normal activities immediately.

double-chin-treatment.shortDescription: Sculpt a defined jawline and eliminate submental fat
double-chin-treatment.title: Double Chin Treatment
double-chin-treatment.description: Non-surgical fat dissolving treatment to reduce double chin and create a more defined jawline. Permanent fat reduction with natural-looking results.

skin-boosters.title: Skin Boosters
skin-boosters.shortDescription: Deep hydration for glowing, plump skin
skin-boosters.description: Injectable hyaluronic acid treatments that deeply hydrate skin from within. Improves texture, radiance, and overall skin quality for a natural glow.

polynucleotide.title: Polynucleotide Treatment
polynucleotide.description: Revolutionary bio-regenerative treatment using polynucleotides to stimulate tissue repair, improve elasticity, and promote healthy, youthful skin.

non-surgical-blepharoplasty.title: Non-Surgical Blepharoplasty
non-surgical-blepharoplasty.description: Revitalize the eye area with our non-surgical blepharoplasty treatment. Reduce hooding, minimize bags, and restore a bright, youthful gaze using advanced injection techniques.

nefertiti-neck-lift.description: Named after the Egyptian queen known for her elegant neck, this treatment uses anti-wrinkle injections to lift the jawline and smooth neck bands.
nefertiti-neck-lift.title: Nefertiti Neck Lift
nefertiti-neck-lift.shortDescription: Redefine your jawline and smooth neck lines

tear-trough-treatment.title: Tear Trough Treatment
tear-trough-treatment.shortDescription: Eliminate under-eye hollows and dark circles
tear-trough-treatment.description: Specialized filler treatment for the delicate under-eye area. Reduces hollowing, minimizes dark circles, and restores youthful brightness to tired eyes.

jawline-reduction.description: Non-surgical jawline slimming using muscle relaxing injections to reduce masseter muscle bulk. Creates a softer, more V-shaped face contour.
jawline-reduction.title: Jawline Reduction
jawline-reduction.shortDescription: Soften a strong jaw for feminine, elegant contours

dermal-fillers.title: Dermal Fillers
dermal-fillers.shortDescription: Restore volume and smooth away lines instantly
dermal-fillers.description: Premium hyaluronic acid fillers to restore lost volume, smooth wrinkles, and enhance facial contours. Natural-looking results that can be tailored to your exact specifications.

lip-enhancement.title: Lip Enhancement
lip-enhancement.description: Expertly administered lip fillers to add volume, define contours, and create beautiful symmetry. From subtle enhancement to statement lips—always natural.

prp-facelift.shortDescription: Harness your body's healing power for natural rejuvenation
prp-facelift.title: PRP Facelift
prp-facelift.description: The PRP Facelift uses your own platelet-rich plasma to stimulate collagen production, improve skin texture, and restore youthful radiance. This natural, regenerative treatment delivers gradual, long-lasting results.

anti-wrinkle.description: FDA-approved muscle relaxing injections to soften frown lines, crow's feet, and forehead wrinkles. Look naturally refreshed without losing facial expression.
anti-wrinkle.shortDescription: Smooth dynamic lines for a refreshed appearance
anti-wrinkle.title: Anti-Wrinkle Injections

spot-injection.title: Spot Injection
spot-injection.description: Precise micro-injections to address specific areas of concern. Perfect for targeting individual lines, asymmetries, or touch-ups.

cheek-augmentation.title: Cheek Augmentation
cheek-augmentation.description: Add volume and definition to flat or aging cheeks with expertly placed dermal fillers. Creates a lifted, more youthful facial appearance.

non-surgical-rhinoplasty.title: Non-Surgical Rhinoplasty
non-surgical-rhinoplasty.shortDescription: Reshape your nose without surgery in minutes
non-surgical-rhinoplasty.description: Transform your nose profile with precisely placed dermal fillers. Smooth bumps, lift the tip, and create balance—all without surgery or downtime.
